name: Nest (Cosmik)
description:
Take flight in this endless runner as you brave the forces outside your nest, gathering resources to both feed your family of chicks and fortify your home.

Use the Up and Down arrow keys or W S keys to move your bird up and down. Dodge the obstacles and collect the twigs and branches to bring back to your baby chicks

This game was a submission in the Global Game Jam 2018 at playcraft NYC

- Cosmik(programmer, design)
-Schematist(music, sound effects, design)
- Dan Lance (2D art, 2D animation, design)
- Colby Stoner (3D art, design)
- SylverstoneKhandr (2D art, production, design) -
